alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Knox; Lorain; Medina; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 5:28AM EDT until July 29 at 6:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Ashland County in north central Ohio... Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Lorain County in north central Ohio... Eastern Knox County in north central Ohio... Holmes County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 615 AM EDT. * At 527 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New London to 7 miles northwest of Loudonville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Wooster, Ashland, Millersburg, Wadsworth, Orrville, Berlin, Rittman, Walnut Creek, Doylestown, Lodi, Loudonville, Gambier, Creston, Dalton, Shreve, West Salem, Danville, Killbuck, Chippewa Lake and Hayesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Holmes; Knox; Lorain; Medina; Wayne
